item.description:
Please join us for a fun, BEAUTIFUL evening of "FREE Live Outdoor Music" at the FINAL Elizabeth Park (Rose Garden Lawn) outdoor concert of the season, this WEDNESDAY, August 29, featuring the very popular Rock, R&B, and Motown sounds of "Mass Conn Fusion"!

>>> Gather @ 6:00 (show 6:30 - 8:00).

>>> LOOK FOR: Al R's four orange traffic cones and/or my red reflectors on white sticks.
We tend to group farther back, nearer the Rose Garden than to the stage. This is a combined gathering of MeetUp & Single Event social networking groups, typically 12-24 party together each time (spontaniously, with or without RSVP's), sometimes many more! NEW FRIENDS ARE ALWAYS WELCOME!

>>> BYOB and snacks/Picnic dinner, if you'd like... bring extra for the post-party that typically ensues as we gather around a propane-fueled ceremic FIRE-PIT at the venue, or nearby private location! As always, be discreet, don't litter, and drive responsibly!

>>> To cut down on email updates, please check back here by 3PM the day of the event for any updated info.

See you there!

- Rob

Rob Pudney

***
Elizabeth Park
1555 Asylum Avenue
Rose Garden Lawn
West Hartford, CT 06107
860-231-9443

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: TONIGHT: "Mass Conn FUSION" - Elizabeth Park - FREE 6:00-8:00
